product_name: C.A.M.P. USA Large Mobile Double Pulley - Ball Bearings
long_description: The C.A.M.P. USA Large Mobile double pulley is designed for rigging and rescue situations with lots of hauling involved. Aluminum sheaves mounted on steel ball bearings are very efficient. Straight center plate has a low clip-in point to facilitate block and tackle systems in rescue operations. Rotating side plates allow easy placement anywhere along the rope. Accommodates ropes up to 15mm in diameter.
short_description: The C.A.M.P. USA Large Mobile double pulley is designed for rigging and rescue situations with lots of hauling involved.
